about.title: About the Conference
about.paragraph: On April 29-30, participants will gather in Ashgabat on a unique platform to discuss key trends in product certification and labelling, exchange experiences, and implement best practices. This event will bring together leading experts, business representatives, and government officials to collectively discuss strategies for improving product quality and ensuring its compliance with international standards.

offers.title: Hotels; Transfers; Visas
offers.text: For inquiries regarding hotel accommodation, visa support, transportation, and tour services, please refer to the travel guide.

offers.title: Explore the ITSE 2025 Exhibition
